document_data.name: Bladreth Crackbone
document_data.mainbody: Battlemaster '''Bladreth Crackbone''' was the High Priest of [[Tempus]] in [[Battlehall]] in the [[Zhentil Keep/Foreign Quarter|Foreign Quarter]] of [[Zhentil Keep]] in the {{YearlinkName|1369}}.
document_data.Activities: Bladreth ran the operations within Battlehall and was assisted by eight other [[priest]]s. He saw a surge in followers flocking to Tempus' banner following the destruction of Zhentil Keep in the {{YearlinkName|1368}}.
